name: Finish Point - BMW Rafting
address: Selat, Klungkung, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80864, Indonesia
review 1: The rafting experience was AMAZING but the rest area after you finish where you can shower , change and have lunch was not to my liking but atleast it's a place for you only and not over crowded to have proper shower and change but it's kinda very low maintained and smelly ü§¢üò∑. Nice fountain and food was ok and buffets style but  you pay extra for the soft drinks
review 2:
Amazing trip
It was perfect place for rafting for the people who love adventures
The adventure starting with zip line which make it more excited
It was 3 hours of rafting with a beautifully amazing natural views
I suggest to take a camera that attached to your body so you can enjoy the rafting and take photos of the amazing views around you also take a backup battery with you
The staff were good in advising and kind they will handle all
Services good they will take you from and to your hotel
review 3: Food was just ok but the staff accompanying you for rafting are amazing hardworking people. It's a must do activity. One of the longest. Around 3 hours in water.
review 4: Finish point of bmw rafting for the telaga River. Lunch was part of the trip and was OK but not great. Difficult to get a gojek. No towels available after the trip even though stated that it would be provided.
review 5: Shower towels supplied . For being out in the country side don't expect high quality but being wet a hot shower and a clean towel is great. Food was great even supplied water melon after. More then happy. Would even do it again. Enjoy

name: Bukit Cilli Rafting (BCR) Finish Point
address: Tangkup, Sidemen, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80864, Indonesia
review 1: For 900k rup this activity is all hype and not much else, bit like deep sea fishing only to catch 100cm fish and told you are lucky. There seems to be insufficient water to get raft down the river. With the guide spending most of his time out of the boat getting you off the bottom. It was three hours of misery in sewerage contaminated river. With a midway stop. Lousy with mossies and beverages 4 x market rate. My but and legs were numb as we bumped away down a river with very little directional control. Most frustrating and tedious 3 hours.
review 2: Super nice rafting with BCR. Also probably the longest rafting tour available at Tegala Waja as the other companies stop way earlier! We felt very safe with our funny guide. Thank you very much for this great experience!
review 3: Had a amazing time at BCR rafting our guide was nice and it was all very safe. I lost my phone during the pick up at my scooter. Luckily they found it üôÇ I recommend
review 4: We had a lovely range of Balinese foods here just after white water rafting. The food was hot and fresh. Pretty good for in the middle of the jungle.
review 5: Wonderful rafting with wonderful team and service

name: Finish Point GAR (Green Adventure Rafting)
address: FCW8+628, Tangkup, Sidemen, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80864, Indonesia
review 1:
I booked a white water rafting trip through my hotel with Green Adventure Rafting. The hotel (The Samanvaya) organised a car to the starting point, where we were fitted with safety gear and given a safety briefing. The team leading the trip were extremely friendly and checked that we were all happy with safety information.

Shortly after, we were on the water, ready to take on the 16km course. From the moment you start, it is pretty much non-stop rapids, which ranged from the gentle to the ferocious. The scenery was absolutely spectacular, and it genuinely looked like something from another planet in places.

The course took nearly 3 hours in total to finish, and did include a couple of short breaks so you could catch your breath. There were some snacks and drinks sold at one of the break points if you needed something. The guides who are in the boat can take your valuables in their waterproof bag, so you can take your phones/wallets with you if you needed.

We opted to buy their photo package at the end  of our adventure. It was very reasonably priced for the quality of the photos, which they took of you along the route. They were very quick to send you the high-resolution versions by WhatsApp and email afterwards.

Overall, we had a fantastic time with Green Adventure Rafting. The operation was professional and we felt very safe whilst we were with them. Our guides were very experienced and seemed to know the river like the back of their hand. If you‚Äôre in Sidemen and looking for a thrilling activity that you won‚Äôt forget ‚Äì Green Adventure Rafting is the place to go.
review 2: We can‚Äôt thank the team at GAR enough. We found them to be the best value for Monday when researching online which was great, but they blew us away with their great service and good vibes! Very professional setup felt safe the whole way. Can‚Äôt say the same for some other companies. We definitely recommend booking with GAR. The guide pictures was a great guy! Please tell him to add me on instagram ü§£@joeyjackedit. The meal at the end we found nice after a long trip, we also had the best coconuts in all of Bali along the way. Wayan was great to chat to at the end and super helpful. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
review 3: We had such a great time rafting in Bali, the landscape is incredible and the guide was amazing - totally recommend
review 4: Green Adventure Rafting have their destination facilities here - hot shower, dry towel, toilets and a really Indonesian nice lunch buffet. Best thing is your driver and your clothes / bag are waiting for you! A very well-organised whitewater rafting experience in Bali
review 5: Very nice and clean place, great lunch after our rafting activity.

name: Finish Point BTR (Bali Tubing & Rafting)
address: Tangkup, Sidemen, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80864, Indonesia
review 1: Awesome experience and so much fun! My sister and I were the only ones in the raft with two guides. We had a great time enjoying the rapids and even a swim at a waterfall. The guides were very knowledgable and we felt safe the entire time. At the end they provide showers, towels and lunch. The price is very reasonable for the length of time and whats included. Absolutely recommend!
review 2: Telaga waja river is really long, 17km so expect a lot of rowing. It was incredibly fun with a few stop points and one with a big waterfall with a small pool below that you can swim in! Really nice people around and service
review 3: Easily the worst experience in Bali. Online it says 250, 000 per person for Tubing but they wanted 450,000 for person and they would only accept cash. The staff is extremely rude and unhelpful. They wanted to operate as a cash only business and when we wanted to leave they refused to provide any help at all. They have no WiFi and when we asked to help with taxi they just claimed they didn‚Äôt exist. I cannot believe how unprofessional and rude the staff was. They just acted like goons and thugs. Would stay far away from them.
review 4: Great experience and very friendly guide. Cash only upon arrival but flexible to allow payment to driver back at hotel after.
review 5: Totally awesome experience, my first time doing rafting.

name: Narta sidemen guest house
address: Tangkup, Sidemen, Karangasem Regency, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
This is a nice and fresh 1-room house with very friendly and caring owner!

You can feel privacyand nature  in this house cause it is located a little away from family buildings.

The garden near the house have  gorgeous view on the river and have a trestle-bed.

House have a kettle and outside table so you can enjoy tea.

Thank you Ketut, we will come back one day.
I highly recommend this place:)
review 2: For the price, it's totally worth it. I went there with my best friend. The view from the balcony was magnificent. The service from Bli Ketut and Mbok Komang were outstanding, very friendly and hospitable. They have a cute cat and dog as their pets. We ordered food from them and got free fruits and Balinese snacks for breakfast. Free flow coffee and tea. We stayed in a three-rooms house. This place is located in the southern part of Sidemen, which is a hidden gem.
review 3:
Just spent three nights there and I am for sure coming back. The room is so nice and the view is amazing. The family is so kind and helpful. I went on A day trip with Ketut and we saw so many beautiful places and had so much fun.
I can definitely recommend both staying at Narta guest house and having Ketut as a tour guide‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
review 4:
We agree with all the wonderful things everyone has said about Ketut and his familie's homestay! The guesthouse is lovely, perfectly clean and one of the few mould-free places on  a budget . The view is incredible and the sound of the river soothes you to sleep like a lullaby. This beautiful big-hearted family will welcome you with open arms and treat you as their own. This is true Bali living at its most authentic.  We also highly recommend the white water rafting!
We will be back!! Thankyou! üôè
review 5:
If you want to experience Bali like the locals do. You‚Äôre in the right place and with the right person!
Owners are very friendly. After staying with the owners you are a part of the family. Staying here feels like a second home and the view morning and evening is amazing! A trip to Bali is not compleet without staying here.

name: Warung Kuliner OMG
address: Tangkup, Sidemen, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80864, Indonesia
review 1: Very nice little place, we walked from our stay at the green kitchen not far from there. The food was really good and the women who has the place was so nice, we got to try her banana cake which was outside the menu but delicious. I would recommend swinging by if you‚Äôre in the the neighbourhood.
review 2: Food was amazing, very affordable. Great people running the toko, very kind. I highly recommend the Soursop Juice!!!!! Beautiful view btw and great tables.
review 3: I've found this little gem on google map while searching for a warung to have lunch. It stood out with its great reviews and definitely did not disappoint. Delicious food, local prices, and friendly staff ‚ú®Ô∏è Make sure to try the homemade doughnuts. They are really good üëå
review 4:
Great place to have coffee and a donut while looking out over the rice fields!
The menu includes many local dishes at local prices.
The owner is very kind and personable.
review 5: It's a village restaurant, amazing food, good service and an ambience different to posh places. Ordered avocado and soursop smoothies, hot-ginger drink, mujair nyat nyat, mei goreng and some baked delights. We loved it!
